question.ask: 1. I did not sleep very well. I had a serious headache.

std.value: Oh, you’d better go to see a doctor.
std.ai: Oh, you’d better go to see a doctor.

std.value: Sorry to hear that. I think you should take a good rest now.
std.ai: Sorry to hear that. I think you should take a good rest now.

std.value: Oh, drink a cup of hot milk and take a good rest now.
std.ai: Oh, drink a cup of hot milk and take a good rest now.

std.value: I’m sorry to hear that. You’d better go to see a doctor and have a good rest.
std.ai: I’m sorry to hear that. You’d better go to see a doctor and have a good rest.

std.value: Oh, I’m sorry to hear that. Hope you’ll be well soon.
std.ai: Oh, I’m sorry to hear that. Hope you’ll be well soon.
